nodes.text: Gwhirrye Baric was a male Trandoshan small-time thug who lived on Corellia during the time of the Galactic Civil War.

After the Battle of Yavin, Gwhirrye Baric resided in the city of Doaba Guerfel on the planet Corellia. He ran a spice racket out of a small hospital in Doaba Guerfel. Circa 1 ABY, a group of Rogue CorSec criminals led by Xyrias Undea harassed his business. Around the same time, a CorSec agent working for Captain Vitala Baize interrogated Baric about a criminal organization known as the Chirq Council. The thug begged the agent to deal with his Rogue CorSec problem in exchange of information. The agent thus fought and killed several Rogue CorSec miscreants, including Xyrias Undea. Gwhirrye Baric later agreed with giving information about the spice dealer Trins Evnar.

Gwhirrye Baric was a non-player character in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. Gwhirrye Baric was added to the game with the update named "Chapter 1: The Corellian Captives", published on June 8, 2006.
